Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • kmail.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides some common utility functions for the rest of the application.
    Author:
    Kelsey McKenna

    • Method Detail

      • restrict

        public static java.lang.String restrict(java.lang.String s,
                                        int length)
        Restricts the given string to the given length and appends "..."
        E.g. restrict("Bananas", 5) would give "Banan..."
        Parameters:
        s - the string to restrict
        length - the length to restrict it to
        Returns:
        the restricted string

      • constructMessageStrip

        public static java.lang.String constructMessageStrip(java.lang.String from,
                                                     java.lang.String subject,
                                                     java.lang.String time,
                                                     boolean read,
                                                     java.lang.String[] flags)
        Constructs the HTML content for the message strip/thumbnail in an inbox.
        Parameters:
        from - the text to be displayed for the person who sent the email
        subject - the subject line of the message
        time - the time the message was sent
        read - whether or not the message has been read. If unread, then it will be displayed in bold.
        flags - the flags for the messaage, e.g. 'spam'
        Returns:
        the formatted text for the message

      • reverse

        public static <T> void reverse(T[] arr)
        Reverses the given array
        Parameters:
        arr - the array to be reversed
